Explainer: What to look for in China's annual parliament session this weekChina's parliament, the National People's Congress (NPC), will kick off its annual session on Tuesday, with all eyes on plans to support growth in the world's second largest economy. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 07:54:31 GMT EHR4LSRU3NIBRMITCK6O4FSLLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/what-looks-chinas-annual-parliament-session-this-week-2024-03-04/Yew Lun Tian世界中国
Philippines will push back against China if maritime interests ignored, Marcos saysPhilippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr on Monday said his country will cooperate with China despite increased tensions, but would push back when its sovereignty, sovereign rights, and jurisdiction in South China Sea are ignored. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 07:43:22 GMT 7EE4LFUBHFKJHIDLQW6GWNL7TM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-will-push-back-against-china-if-maritime-interests-ignored-marcos-2024-03-04/Karen Lema, Mikhail Flores世界亚太地区
Nepal coalition in crisis, PM in talks with opposition for new allianceNepal’s Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal was in talks with two opposition parties to form a new coalition on Monday, citing difficulties with his present ally, the centrist Nepali Congress party, one of his aides said. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 07:41:03 GMT BY44M3F7T5M6LGQYWJRSWD74LU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/nepal-coalition-crisis-pm-talks-with-opposition-new-alliance-2024-03-04/Gopal Sharma世界亚太地区
Hedge funds spot money to be made on JapanThe Bank of Japan, long the outlier as other major economies jacked up interest rates to curb inflation, is expected to end its negative interest rate policy soon. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 07:12:10 GMT KN4QQHSQ3VOSPLI6B4HBMM3PXE https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/hedge-funds-spot-money-be-made-japan-2024-03-04/Nell Mackenzie, Carolina Mandl, Summer Zhen市场财富
China cancels premier's press conference for first time since 1993China's Premier Li Qiang will not hold a press conference after the close of this year's annual parliamentary meeting, an official said on Monday, ending a tradition maintained for three decades. China opposes using anti-espionage law to attack its business environmentChina opposes any attempt to denigrate or attack its business environment by misreading the country's counter-espionage law, National People's Congress (NPC) spokesman Lou Qinjian told reporters at a press conference on Monday. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 05:22:55 GMT M3JBDA7CFZIIPHF4VX3WZDEHZE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-opposes-using-anti-espionage-law-attack-its-business-environment-2024-03-04/Reuters世界中国
China to hold 2024 parliamentary meeting from March 5-11China's National People's Congress (NPC), or parliament, will hold its annual meeting in Beijing from March 5 to March 11, NPC spokesman Lou Qinjian told reporters at a news conference on Monday. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 04:14:06 GMT HTV66OXADBM2HEWIZCUOJVB46Y https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-holds-2024-parliamentary-meeting-march-5-11-2024-03-04/Reuters世界中国
China's BYD prices new version of best-selling EV lower than predecessorChina's leading electric vehicle (EV) maker BYD on Monday launched a new version of its best-selling car at a price lower than the final price of its discontinued predecessor, as a price war rages in the world's largest automobile market. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 03:12:30 GMT QLFCPJT6F5L3BAV6IC7IEFENPE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinas-bid-prices-new-version-best- sell-even-lower-than-predecessor-2024-03-04/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Philippines conducts marine patrols to check presence of Chinese research shipsThe Philippines on Monday deployed a coastguard vessel to carry out a two-week patrol mission in waters north and east of the country to intensify its maritime presence and check on Chinese research vessels that were spotted in Benham Rise.
